class_notes: Prior completion of PSYC 110, or 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology. OPUS waitlist is available at the beginning of add/drop/swap.
course_description: Theories and research addressing the nature of higher mental processes, including such areas of cognition as categorization, attention, memory, knowledge representation, imagery, psycholinguistics, and problem solving.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in New Psyc Bldg 290 (36 Eagle Ro
